alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 5:35AM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Piscataquog River near Goffstown affecting Hillsborough County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Warner River At Davisville affecting Merrimack County. For the PISCATAQUOG RIVER...including Goffstown...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Warner River...including Davisville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Piscataquog River near Goffstown. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. At 11.0 feet, Flooding begins near the village of Riverdale and areas below Glen Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EST Saturday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
